title: Embroidered picture
medium:
Medium: silk and metal embroidery on silk foundation
Technique: embroidered in satin, stem, crouching, and needle lace (looping) stitches on 7&1 satin foundation
description: Woman holding a bird in one hand and a snake in the other.  An animal in each corner: horse, camel, unicorn, and warthog.  Flowers, birds, and bugs sitll in the field.
name: Embroidered picture
